name: Dreadstone Keep
description:
Dreadstone Keep is a roguelike, strategy turn-based game where you must defeat the two powerful entities that rule the ancient castle. Acquire upgrades, use your wits and battle powerful pixel art enemies. With one Dark Power at the top and another at the bottom, will you be powerful enough to ensure peace and prosperity for your people?

This is the playtest demo version of the game, and any and all feedback you want to give us would be great! Any suggestions for game content are very welcome as well, please participate in the next steps of the game content creation! Be sure to join our discord!

The final version of the game will contain integration with Totem Assets, allowing you to carry your progress across many other games. Be sure to check how it works here.

P.s.: If you are using the keyboard, use Q to throw your weapon!
